title.rendered: His Excellency Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience, the Executives of the Association of Foreign Relations Professionals of Nigeria (AFRPN) led by its President, Ambassador (Dr.) Gani Lawal

content.rendered:
The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, His Excellency Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience, the Executives of the Association of Foreign Relations Professionals of Nigeria (AFRPN) led by its President, Ambassador (Dr.) Gani Lawal on Wednesday, 20th March, 2024.
On the AFRPN delegation was Amb. Sani Bala and Amb. Usman Sarki . Discussions centered among others, on the Association’s upcoming 6th Annual Lecture/Conference scheduled to hold on 26th March, 2024 at the Rotunda, MFA. The topic of this year’s Lecture is “Unconstitutional Change of Government and Attainment of AU 2063 Agenda and UN SDGs – The case of West Africa and the Sahel Subregion.” The event will feature eminent personalities as Speakers.
